meanings.definition: Officially attached or connected to an organization or group.
meanings.sent1: The new employee was affiliated with the company.
meanings.sent2: She is affiliated with the local charity organization.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed affiliated with the neighborhood birds, always watching them.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were so closely affiliated with the company's mission that he was promoted.
meanings.sent5: The badge she wore proudly displayed her affiliated status with the team.

meanings.definition: Associated or connected with another organization or group.
meanings.sent1: The affiliated companies worked together on the project.
meanings.sent2: He felt affiliated with the group of artists he met at the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The dog seemed affiliated with the squirrels, always chasing them up the tree.
meanings.sent4: Her success was closely affiliated with the support of her affiliated partners.
meanings.sent5: The logo on his shirt clearly showed he was affiliated with the sports team.
